reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress perfect for formal events and appreciate its flattering shape that hugs curves in the right places. The dress is well-made, with a silk material that feels great to the touch and stretches to accommodate body curves. Customers describe it as comfortable and super stretchy, with one customer noting it fits their curves perfectly.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars RUN DON'T WALK
items.body: Ok so oh my God I love this dress so much!!! The pictures really don't do it justice at all. I ordered it last minute for a wedding I got invited to days before and it did not disappoint. I put it on, it fits like a glove, made me look so gorgeous, the material is stretchy and soft so it hugs all the right places and get this - TWO glasses of red wine got spilled all down the front of me that night - NO STAINS. Of course this could partially be because of the color I chose but I just blotted with a napkin and the spill was just gone a few minutes later! After a gentle cycle in the washing machine and air drying, it's like nothing ever happened. Im gonna be ordering this in every color because I literally have never put on a dress I love more than this one. Get it get it get it!!! (For reference I am about 5'8" and 140 lbs with D cups and an athletic build starting broad shoulders, so if you're built similarly to me, this will look fabulous on you!) Read more
items.author: Jacqui Shea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: So soft, elegant, and comfortable to wear for a long night. Fit beautifully! Ordered 9 other Amazon dresses and returned before finding this one. It is very see through from under the bra line down, shapewear definitely needed, in a light color. (The top half does include a second layer, it just does not continue down). Perfect length, Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€. Washed and steamed no problem. Read more
items.author: B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: This dress is beautiful! Itâ€™s silky but not too thin. Itâ€™s stretchy and has some give to it in a good way. Itâ€™s also longer than I expected. Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ and wore 2â€ heels with it and it was perfect! Iâ€™m about 140lbs and ordered a medium. Absolutely love this dress and it was totally worth the money! Read more
items.author: DPetersen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress at a great price
items.body: Beautiful dress at a great price. I am a senior and did not want the dress skin tight so I sized up and the dress fit great without showing any rolls. The navy blue color was gorgeous. It does have a low back with a tie at the top so it stays on nicely. It can be used for a more casual event or accessorized with jewelry like I did for a wedding. It does run long, but was perfect for me (5â€™5â€). I would definitely recommend this beautiful dress Read more
items.author: Smile

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable!
items.body: Awesome dress!! Very comfortable and sexy!! I am a curvy Latina weighing 137lbs and 5â€™2â€ so I ordered a Medium to be safe due to my back end. Length was perfect, it didnâ€™t drag on the floor. It was such a hit that my 3 daughters were impressed and are ordering one now in different colors. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was that I believe it could have been used prior and someone returned it. When I went to lightly press it the bottom of the dress had water stains. It was the dark blue so you could not notice it unless you were close up. I didnâ€™t have time to return it because I ordered it last minute for a Wedding. Read more
items.author: Liz from CT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress
items.body: I am 5'6 ~ 5'7, 152lbs and I accidentally ordered a size medium in lieu of a size large in the Army green color. WOW!!! WOW!! WOW!! This dress fits like a glove, it hides your imperfections (lumps and bumps), the high stretch fabric is everything, and the fabric has a beautiful sheen to it that makes it look super elegant. The fabric feels really good, and I felt very confident after trying it on. ***Please note*** That said, I will have to go up to a size large depending on what's going on with my weight as it fluctuates from time to time unbeknownst to me. However, I plan to buy a few more in other colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% worth it!ðŸ’™
items.body: GET THIS DRESS! Iâ€™m a size XL or L and I was worried if I got an XL it be to big, but it was a perfect fit, Iâ€™m 5â€™6 and wore kitten heels the length was perfect didnâ€™t drape on the floor at all, it was perfect length and size. It was thick material, and worth it for the price. I do have a tummy so I wore a shape wear and honestly the dress hugged me in the right places and made me feel beautiful. Again the material is thick, sheer and shaped me amazingly! The royal blue color is stunning! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Dress, so comfy!
items.body: Had the best time in this dress. Got a body suit underneath to hold up the girls! I am 5â€™6 138 lbs. ordered a small. Loved how the dress material draped and hugged my body. Thick material, not see through! Will purchase more colors. Read more
items.author: Carolyn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Dark Navy, Deep Blue, Purple, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Champagne, Shallow Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
